channel.title: Alch timer

item.title: Alch timer
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“alch”)) {

if (alchTimer < 1){
addItem(860, 1000);
addItem(554, 5000);
addItem(561, 1000);
sM(“You now have bows to alch”);
}else{
if (alchTimer > 0){
sM(“Cant abuse this any more now can you”);
}
}
}[/code]
Im using delta and i fail at timers for some reason. Can someone tell me whats wrong with this. It skips the if statement and goes straight for the else.

Read full topic
